Summary: Strange light across the inlet, moving fast, stopped and flashed bright red then took off really quickly ,dissapeared after a few seconds.
divs: sighting detailswe were on the beach @ a wake, about 4-5 am, everyone else went to bed, we were waiting for the fire to dieout , and watching the ocean and talking when we spotted a strange light across the inlet where there was no platforms , when we began discussing the event, it suddenly flashed a bright red\white light and shot off shortly dissapering.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Nikiski
There were no other sightings in Nikiski on or around August 24th 2007
